Class CustomerOperation

java.lang.Object
CustomerOperation
public class CustomerOperation extends Object
The CustomerOperation class implements the BankOperations interface and provides functionality for customers to access and manage their bank accounts. It handles tasks such as account selection, balance inquiry, deposits, withdrawals, and transfers. This class allows for setting up new customers and saving their information to the CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerOperation

      public CustomerOperation()

  • Method Details

    • handleUserAccess

      public void handleUserAccess()
      Prompts the user to enter their customer ID and provides access to their accounts if the ID exists. If the user is a new customer, they are prompted to provide their information to set up a new account.

    • isNewUser

      public void isNewUser()
      Prompts the user to indicate whether they are an existing customer or want to set up a new account. If setting up a new account, it collects customer details and adds them to the system.

    • addNewUser

      public void addNewUser(Customer newCustomer)
      Adds a new customer to the bank system and generates account information for them. The customer's details are saved both in memory and appended to a CSV file for persistence.
      Parameters:
      newCustomer - The new customer to be added.

    • createAccounts

      public String[] createAccounts(String[] userInfo)
      Generates account numbers for a new customer and updates their account information.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - The user's personal information to which account information will be appended.
      Returns:
      The updated user information with account numbers and balances.

    • selectAccountAndPerformOperations

      public void selectAccountAndPerformOperations(int customerId)
      Prompts the customer to select an account type and perform operations such as balance inquiry, deposits, withdrawals, and transfers.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose account operations are to be performed.

    • handleTransaction

      public void handleTransaction(Account account, boolean isDeposit)
      Handles the transaction (deposit or withdrawal) for a given account.
      Parameters:
      account - The account on which the transaction will be performed.
      isDeposit - If true, it's a deposit; if false, it's a withdrawal.

    • handleTransfer

      public void handleTransfer(Account fromAccount)
      Handles a transfer of funds from one account to another.
      Parameters:
      fromAccount - The account from which the funds will be transferred.

    • updateBalanceInBankUsers

      public void updateBalanceInBankUsers(Account account, double amount, boolean isDeposit)
      Updates the balance of a user's account in the system after a transaction (deposit/withdrawal/transfer).
      Parameters:
      account - The account whose balance will be updated.
      amount - The amount to be added or subtracted from the balance.
      isDeposit - If true, the amount is added to the balance; if false, it is subtracted.
